title: Is there a successful way to install an external laser sensor grid system over an area of approximately 4 meters x 4 meters? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many ways to do this. Call an alarm company and they will give you a host of options. There are also bars full of sensors (light curtains) that are placed near robots to sense someone placing a hand where they should not. Motion sensors, video motion sensors, IR scanners. If you set up the mirrors correctly you could do it with one single laser.
